pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Structure Learning in Graphical Models using Birth-Death MCMC // Statistical tools for Bayesian structure learning in undirected graphical models for continuous, discrete, and mixed data. The package is implemented the recent improvements in the Bayesian graphical models literature, including Mohammadi and Wit (2015) doi:10.1214/14-BA889, Mohammadi and Wit (2019) doi:10.18637/jss.v089.i03.
